mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notify WHERE email = #{email} AND is_read = 0

SELECT n.notify_id, n.email, n.schedule_id, n.notify_category_id, nc.category_name, n.message, n.is_read FROM notify n JOIN notify_category nc ON n.notify_category_id = nc.notify_category_id WHERE n.email = #{email} ORDER BY n.is_read ASC, n.notify_id DESC
